org.cef.handler

接口 CefResourceHandler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CefResourceHandlerAdapter 

    public interface CefResourceHandler
    Implement this interface to handle custom resource requests. The methods of this class will always be called on the IO thread. (实现此接口以处理定制资源请求。此类的方法将始终在IO线程上调用。)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法  实例方法  抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cancel()
      Request processing has been canceled. (请求处理已被取消。)
      void getResponseHeaders(CefResponse response, IntRef responseLength, StringRef redirectUrl)
      Retrieve response header information. (检索响应头信息。)
      boolean processRequest(CefRequest request, CefCallback callback)
      Begin processing the request. (开始处理请求。)
      boolean readResponse(byte[] dataOut, int bytesToRead, IntRef bytesRead, CefCallback callback)
      Read response data. (读取响应数据。)

    • 方法详细资料

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Request processing has been canceled. (请求处理已被取消。)

      • getResponseHeaders

        void getResponseHeaders(CefResponse response,
                        IntRef responseLength,
                        StringRef redirectUrl)
        Retrieve response header information. If the response length is not known set |responseLength| to -1 and readResponse() will be called until it returns false. If the response length is known set |responseLength| to a positive value and readResponse() will be called until it returns false or the specified number of bytes have been read. Use the |response| object to set the mime type, http status code and other optional header values. (检索响应头信息。如果响应长度未知，则设置| responseLength |。到-1，readResponse（）将被调用，直到返回false。如果已知响应长度，则设置| responseLength |。设置为正值，将调用readResponse（）直到返回false或已读取指定的字节数。使用|响应|对象，用于设置mime类型，http状态代码和其他可选标头值。)
        参数:
        response - The request response that should be returned. Instance only valid within the scope of this method. (-应该返回的请求响应。实例仅在此方法的范围内有效。)
        responseLength - Optionally set the response length if known. (-（可选）设置响应长度（如果已知）。)
        redirectUrl - Optionally redirect the request to a new URL. (-（可选）将请求重定向到新的URL。)

      • processRequest

        boolean processRequest(CefRequest request,
                       CefCallback callback)
        Begin processing the request. (开始处理请求。)
        参数:
        request - The request itself. Cannot be modified in this callback. Instance only valid within the scope of this method. (-请求本身。无法在此回调中修改。实例仅在此方法的范围内有效。)
        callback - Callback to continue or cancel the request. (-回调以继续或取消请求。)
        返回:
        True to handle the request and call CefCallback.Continue() once the response header information is available. (为true时处理请求，并在响应头信息可用时调用CefCallback.Continue（）。)

      • readResponse

        boolean readResponse(byte[] dataOut,
                     int bytesToRead,
                     IntRef bytesRead,
                     CefCallback callback)
        Read response data. If data is available immediately copy up to |bytesToRead| bytes into |dataOut|, set |bytesRead| to the number of bytes copied, and return true. To read the data at a later time set |bytesRead| to 0, return true and call CefCallback.Continue() when the data is available. To indicate response completion return false. (读取响应数据。如果有数据，请立即复制到| bytesToRead |。个字节到| dataOut |中，设置| bytesRead |到复制的字节数，然后返回true。要在以后读取数据，请设置| bytesRead |。设为0，则返回true，并在数据可用时调用CefCallback.Continue（）。要指示响应完成，请返回false。)
        参数:
        dataOut - Write data to this buffer. (-将数据写入此缓冲区。)
        bytesToRead - Size of the buffer. (-缓冲区的大小。)
        bytesRead - Number of bytes written to the buffer. (-写入缓冲区的字节数。)
        callback - Callback to execute if data will be available asynchronously. (-如果数据异步可用，则执行回调。)
        返回:
        True if more data is or will be available. (如果有或将有更多数据可用，则为true。)
